oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Introduction Reasons for survey research > to describe characteristics of certain groups > to make specific predictions (Churchill and Brown 2007: p. 105) > to get an idea about quantities of interest in target population > to report means, totals, proportions for target population (Biemer and Lyberg 2003: p. 49)
